text: makkaḷil cilar avarkaḷiṭam; "tiṭamāka makkaḷil (palar uṅkaḷuṭaṉ pōriṭuvataṟkākat) tiraṇṭu viṭṭārkaḷ, eṉavē appaṭaiyaippaṟṟi añcik koḷḷuṅkaḷ" eṉṟu kūṟi(accuṟutti)ṉar;. Āṉāl (itu) avarkaḷiṉ īmāṉaip perukki valuppaṭac ceytatu. "Allāhvē eṅkaḷukkup pōtumāṉavaṉ. Avaṉē eṅkaḷukkuc ciṟanta pātukāvalaṉ" eṉṟu avarkaḷ kūṟiṉārkaḷ
